column6: You see them as a brain, an athlete, a basket case, a princess and a criminal. That's the way Peter, Mary Jane, Liz, Flash and Kong saw each other at 7:00 this morning. But when detention is over, nothing will ever be the same again!
column8: | penciller (cover):Mark Bagley | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:Scott Hanna | colorist:J. D. Smith
